main event: Unidentified flying object sighted near Osan Air Base in Korea on November 14, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as having colors varying from reddish-yellow to whitish-yellow., The sighting lasted between 15 to 30 seconds., Two different observers noted the object moving in straight and level flight at approximately 500-600 knots altitude., The object disappeared into clouds, which limited further observation., One observer had prior experience as a GCA operator, contributing to their estimation of the object's speed and altitude.
sighted object: unidentified flying object with oval and disc-like appearance
witness description: One observer was a GCA operator with fair knowledge of aircraft.
